alert.note: Alert for Fleming; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 25 at 6:19PM EDT until August 25 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Kentucky, including the following counties, Bath, Fleming and Rowan. * WHEN...Until 845 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory and warned areas. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Owingsville, Marshall, Salt Lick, Slate Valley, Craigs, Peasticks, Wyoming, Odessa, Polksville, Moore`s Ferry, Reynoldsville, Midland, Ramey and Farmers. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
